items.title: aloha top
items.desc: This braided beauty features peek-a-boo cutouts in the center and sides with a tie back for a custom fit.

items.title: aloha bottom
items.desc: Our aloha bottom is the perfect tanning style with skimpy coverage through the back and minimal side straps. The low-rise briefs have a seamless finish with a soft elasticated waistband to flatter your hips.

items.title: mahalo top
items.desc: She's sugar and spice and everything we've ever dreamed of. The mahalo top includes adjustable and removable straps, with a unique knot feature in the front for a custom fit. We already know you'll fall in love with this supportive beaut.

items.title: mahalo bottom
items.desc: The high-leg style we've been waiting for. The mahalo bottom has no competition - with an alluring V-shape she's in a league of her own.

items.title: luau top
items.desc: Meet the luau top. This romantic bikini top features a sultry front cut-out, girly ruffle edge, and adjustable back straps for a fit that's certain to flaunt it all.

items.title: luau bottom
items.desc: Featuring a high cut leg and adjustable tie sides, the luau skimpy bottom will accentuate what you've got. Pair her back with any of our luxe stretch top and let's just say, you'll thank us later.

items.title: honu top
items.desc: Casual-cool cropped raglan style top with ultra-feminine knotted front in our signature luxe nylon swim fabric. Finished with a collar neck and flattering cap sleeves.

items.title: honu bottom
items.desc: The next big trend in swimwear, the high cut bottom. Our honu bottom is simple yet stunning with a high cut fit and cheeky coverage in back with center seam that hugs your curves in all the right places.

items.title: ohana top
items.desc: This top is a major crowd-pleaser, and rightfully so. The ohana top features our luxe ribbed fabric with thin, adjustable straps that will definitely highlight the shoulders and give the girls a much desired boost.

items.title: ohana bottom
items.desc: This skimpy, high leg fit is everything. It'll hug your curves in all the right places and perfectly accentuate the booty. You're welcome.

items.title: hula top
items.desc: What's knot to love about the hula top? The ultra flattering low scoop neck is finished with a sexy knotted front detail and adjustable straps for a custom fit.

items.title: hula bottom
items.desc: We're obsessed with the figure hugging fit of the hula bottom that gives your backside major bragging rights. This ribbed bottom features a seam down the middle back and cheeky coverage.

items.title: akahi top
items.desc: We're totally obsessing over this bandeau style top. Ultra thin, adjustable straps add a delicate, feminine finishing touch. Pair with our intricate little akahi bottoms for your favorite teeny bikini.

items.title: akahi bottom
items.desc: Our itsiest bitsiest bikini bottom to date with added rose gold rings for some dainty detailing on both the front and back. The versatile soft elasticated skinny strap waistband is designed to sit low on the hips, or adjust a little higher for an on-trend, high-cut silhouette.

items.title: moana top
items.desc: We're totally obsessing over this bandeau style top. Ultra thin, adjustable straps add a delicate, feminine finishing touch. Pair with our intricate little moana bottoms for your favorite teeny bikini.

items.title: moana bottom
items.desc: Our itsiest bitsiest bikini bottom to date with added rose gold rings for some dainty detailing on both the front and back. The versatile soft elasticated skinny strap waistband is designed to sit low on the hips, or adjust a little higher for an on-trend, high-cut silhouette.

items.title: shaka top
items.desc: Feelin' flirty? We know the feeling, so let us introduce you to the shaka top. Featuring a plunging v-cut neckline, flirty ruffle detail, and adjustable front tie - we guarantee shaka will bring out the best of you (and your girls).

items.title: shaka bottom
items.desc: Perfect for the beach or poolside, this charming bottom features a low front rise, side ruffles, and skimpy back coverage. Pair her back with our shaka top for an ultra femme finishing touch.

items.title: pua top
items.desc: Feelin' flirty? We know the feeling, so let us introduce you to the shaka top. Featuring a plunging v-cut neckline, flirty ruffle detail, and adjustable front tie - we guarantee shaka will bring out the best of you (and your girls).

items.title: pua bottom
items.desc: Perfect for the beach or poolside, this charming bottom features a low front rise, side ruffles, and skimpy back coverage. Pair her back with our shaka top for an ultra femme finishing touch.

items.title: mahina top
items.desc: This modern crop features a scoop neck front with sexy notched neckline and peek-a-boo cutout. The design is engineered to provide a supportive and flattering fit with uplifting underband and pull on design with thicker straps. This fully lined crop is feminine and sporty all in one and a perfect layering piece.

items.title: mahina bottom
items.desc: A low rise, cheeky coverage bottom with elastic binding surrounding you in all the right places? Yes please. Made from our luxe rib fabric the soft elasticated waistband is designed to sit low on the hips, or adjust a little higher for an on-trend, high-cut silhouette

items.title: lei bottom
